00054 Attribute::Attribute() {
00055   // Bouml preserved body begin 0002DC03
00056   // Bouml preserved body end 0002DC03
00057 }
00058 
00059 Attribute::Attribute(string key, string value) {
00060         this->key = key;
00061         this->value = value;
00062 }
00063 
00064 bool Attribute::operator==(Attribute& other) {
00065         return ( (this->key.compare(other.key) == 0) && (this->value.compare(other.value) == 0) );
00066 }
00067 
00068 bool Attribute::operator==(const Attribute& other){
00069         return ( (this->key.compare(other.key) == 0) && (this->value.compare(other.value) == 0) );
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool Attribute::operator!=(Attribute& other) {
00073         return !(*this == other);
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool Attribute::operator!=(const Attribute& other){
00077         return !(*this == other);
00078 }
00079 
00080 Attribute::~Attribute() {
00081   // Bouml preserved body begin 0002DC83
00082   // Bouml preserved body end 0002DC83
00083 }
00084 
00085 ostream& operator<<(ostream &outStream, const Attribute &attribute) {
00086         outStream << "(" << attribute.key << " = " << attribute.value << ")";
00087 
00088         return outStream;
00089 }
00090 
00091 extern bool attributeListContainsAttribute(vector<Attribute> attributeList, Attribute queryAttribute) {
00092         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(attributeList.size()); ++i) {
00093                 if (attributeList[i] == queryAttribute) {
00094                         return true;
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         return false;
00098 }
